Name: Connection
About the game: WARNING: This game can trigger seizures in people with photosensitive epilepsy. Viewer discretion is advised. Don't lose the signal to get out of here. The Main Character has been assigned to research in the selected area. The Area has been abandoned and various creatures live in the area. Keep going without being caught by the creatures During the mission, complete your research by examining the area with the guidance and assistance of the professor and leave the area. The Game Environment The game starts in an abandoned area and then It continues inside a structure built underground. There are various creatures in some parts of the area and various events are happening. - Read and apply messages from the professor. - Keep going without getting caught by evil creatures. - Keep searching by finding hidden objects. - Direct the research by completing the missing pieces. - Explore your area.
